seg.quote: They attempted to gain access through a side entrance.
The entrance door gives access to a living room.

sense.def:
Access
je tudi priložnost ali pravica, da nekaj ali nekoga vidimo ali uporabimo.

seg.quote: I demanded access to a telephone.
Has Donald got access to the child?

sense.def:
To access information from a computer
pomeni dobiti podatke iz računalnika.
